author: Yoda____
title: not for me
review: my sister got this set but it isn't exactly what I'd call a set. I has some nice pieces and most of them work with normal lego. I'm giving it a 4 because it is a really good set for it's target audience but not so much for everyone else. The Mickey and Minnie figures look (it pains me to type it) charming.

author: TheDarkKnight
title: Let's get this over with...
review: OK... so.... At, y'know, three... I liked Mickey. So I don't know where the basplate and/or most pieces are. But since MegaBlocks owns Disney brickfigs now, I guess that makes this valuable. I guess. they may be. *coughcoughcoughcutecoughcough*

author: Unqualified_AT_AT_Driver
title: Some Good Pieces
review:
I remember getting this set when I was really young. I still actually have about  half of the pieces from it. Some of the pieces in this set are very useful and I still use some. For that I give it 4.

Pros:
Cool pieces (Archway, Umbrella, Gate, Roof Pieces)

Cons:
None really, especially if you like Mickey Mouse and all things Mickey

Get it if you like Mickey or want the pieces.
